sentences.en: Automotive waxes, whether natural or synthetic, are meant to be sacrificial barriers.
sentences.cn: 车蜡, 不管是天然的还是合成的, 都是牺牲品.

sentences.en: Bridge, Steel Pipe Piles sacrificial anode installation and welding of underwater construction.
sentences.cn: 大桥 、 码头钢管桩牺牲阳极水下安装与焊接施工.

sentences.en: But I love the idea of the Sacrificial Lamb.
sentences.cn: 但是我喜欢献祭的羔羊这个观念.

sentences.en: Can even sacrificial flesh avert your doom? Can you then exult?
sentences.cn: 难道祭肉可以消除你的灾祸,使你得著欢乐 吗 ?

sentences.en: Domestic animals are the main victims in sacrificial ceremonies.
sentences.cn: 祭祀用的祭品主要是家畜.

sentences.en: In ancient times, this kind of sacrificial ceremony was already dramatized.
sentences.cn: 在古时候这种祭祀仪式已经戏剧化了.

sentences.en: Polyimide has become a main material for sacrificial layer in MEMS switch.
sentences.cn: 目前,聚酰亚胺已成为MEMS开关中一种主要的牺牲层材料.

sentences.en: Sacrificial anodes protection can decrease the degree of corrosion wear very effectively.
sentences.cn: 牺牲阳极保护法可以有效地从抑制腐蚀的角度来减弱腐蚀磨损.

sentences.en: The numerous sacrificial pits are arranged in an orderly fashion.
sentences.cn: 祭祀坑数量众多,排列有序.

sentences.en: The sacrificial abundant meat uses area Yanshan's mutton.
sentences.cn: 腊丰肉采用沿山一带的羊肉.

sentences.en: The sacrificial objects unearthed in Mawangdui are of high value to archeological researches.
sentences.cn: 马王堆出土的殉葬品有很高的考古价值.

sentences.en: The sacrificial vessels are ready and the ceremony will start soon.
sentences.cn: 礼器齐备,典礼马上开始.

sentences.en: The Shang Dynasty rulers treasured bronze ware, especially the bronze sacrificial vessels.
sentences.cn: 商周时期造型精美的青铜器, 特别是青铜礼器,极为统治者所珍视.

sentences.en: What is the maximum self - sacrificial cost that can evolve in these circumstances?
sentences.cn: 在这些情形下逐渐产生的“ 自我 牺牲”行为有够有多大的限度?

sentences.en: You may have to be the sacrificial lamb in obtaining concessions from our opponents.
sentences.cn: 为了要取得反对一方的让步,也许得牺牲你的利益.

trans.tran_en: relating to or offered as a sacrifice
